name: December 2022
title: December 2022
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3723034649 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Sign-In Widget, version 7.1.0
      • Okta MFA Credential Provider for Windows, version 1.3.8
        • Okta Provisioning agent, version 2.0.11
          • Identity Governance
          • Preview the token inline hook
          • IE and Edge Legacy plugins
          • Security enhancement of Okta Verify push notifications
          • Certificate chain builder for Smart Card IdP
          • Telephony usage report
          • Single sign-out changes for custom domains
          • People page improvements
          • New System Log event
          • Password history policy enforced in strict mode is GA in Preview
          • PBKDF2 Hashing Algorithm support is GA in Preview
          • Preview the token inline hook
          • Revoke user sessions is GA in Preview
          • Step-up authentication using ACR values is GA in Prod
          • Redirect added to end of sign-in flow
          • Loading Page Animation feature for the Brands API is GA in Production

See: https://help.okta.com/en-us/Content/Topics/ReleaseNotes/archive/oce-relnotes-2022.htm

Feature

Remark

Sign-In Widget, version 7.1.0

No immediate change needed, but should be tackled in future

Okta MFA Credential Provider for Windows, version 1.3.8

not in use

Okta Provisioning agent, version 2.0.11

not in use

Identity Governance

not in our package

Preview the token inline hook

nice to have

IE and Edge Legacy plugins

not in use

Security enhancement of Okta Verify push notifications

not in use

Certificate chain builder for Smart Card IdP

not in use

Telephony usage report

not in use

Single sign-out changes for custom domains

irrelevant for our use cases; might be interesting for admins

People page improvements

nice to have

New System Log event

nice to have

API

Password history policy enforced in strict mode is GA in Preview

I have never seen us update password regularly

PBKDF2 Hashing Algorithm support is GA in Preview

not relevant for us

Preview the token inline hook

nice to have

Revoke user sessions is GA in Preview

nice to have

Step-up authentication using ACR values is GA in Prod

irrelevant for now, we should use this in future for special operations

Redirect added to end of sign-in flow

nice to have, should not interfere with our current setup

Loading Page Animation feature for the Brands API is GA in Production

should be checked to be enabled DONE
